translation.ja: NETFLIX オリジナルシリーズ

translation.en: We should've done this ourselves.
translation.ja: 俺たちが行くんだった

translation.en: We know the king's palace better than your patsy does.
translation.ja: 王宮にも詳(くわ)しいしな

translation.en: Teela hasn't failed us yet.
translation.ja: ティーラはだいじょうぶ

translation.en: She'll find what we seek.
translation.ja: きっと剣(けん)を見つける

translation.en: With that sword, the Power of Grayskull
translation.ja: その剣(けん)があれば グレイスカルの力は 私たちのもの

translation.en: will soon be ours.
translation.ja: グレイスカルの力は 私たちのもの

translation.en: How's the nation of Eternos this evening?
Quiet as a shadow, King Randor.
translation.ja: 影(かげ)のように静かです

translation.en: Never trust shadows, General.
translation.ja: 影(かげ)を信じてはならん

translation.en: You catch that game of modulok?
No, modulok's too complicated.
translation.ja: モジュロックは理解できん

translation.en: Running on your hands and passing with your feet?
translation.ja: 手で走って 足でパス？

translation.en: [sucks teeth] No, thank you.
I'll take it from here, Soldier.
Of course, General Dolos.
I'll take it from here, Soldier.
Evelyn better pay me this time.
translation.ja: 報酬(ほうしゅう) はずんでよね

translation.en: Oh, come on!
'Word witch didn't say there'd be this many to choose from.
translation.ja: こんなにあるなんて 聞いてない

translation.en: -Okay. -[knuckles crack]
Which one of you is gonna give me that trademark Teela Grayskull tingle?
translation.ja: さあ どこにあるの？ 感じ取るのよ ティーラ

translation.en: I've been contracted to go through all this trouble to steal a--
translation.ja: これを盗(ぬす)み出すために ここまで…

translation.en: [woman's voice echoing] Sword, Eternia, Grayskull, secrets, Eternia, Power,
translation.ja: 剣(けん)　エターニア グレイスカル　秘密…

translation.en: Masters of the Universe, Masters of the Universe.
translation.ja: 力(パワー)　マスターズ･オブ･ ユニバース

translation.en: That was way more than a tingle.
[soldier] Drop the sword!
I'll just put it right... here.
Did she just continue to steal?
translation.ja: 盗(ぬす)みをやめない気か？

translation.en: Sorry. [chuckles] I just needed my hands free to do... this.
translation.ja: 両手が空かないと これができないの

translation.en: Oh, no!
How will we ever grab our swords with our other hands?
translation.ja: 反対の手で剣(けん)を持てと？

translation.en: Oh, sorry. My thumb stuck.
Able to do... this!
translation.ja: できるのは これよ！

translation.en: Oh, yeah, much better.
[solider] Somebody stop her!
-You! Halt! -[blasters firing] Get her now!
translation.ja: 止まれ！　つかまえろ！

translation.en: Go! Go! Get her!
Ah-ha-ha, one of my legs fell asleep, sorry.
translation.ja: 片足が眠(ねむ)ってた　失礼

translation.en: Must you have brought your apprentice along?
translation.ja: なぜ弟子を連れてきたの？

translation.en: [soldier] You! Halt!
Duncan didn't bring the Royal Guard to the extraction point. Just sayin'.
translation.ja: 脱出(だっしゅつ)地点に衛兵を 連れてきてどうする

translation.en: Incoming!
What an unfortunate turn of events...
for them.
No! They're just doing their jobs!
translation.ja: ダメ！ 悪い人たちじゃない

translation.en: Give me the sword, Hand Witch.
translation.ja: 早くその剣(けん)を渡(わた)しなさい

translation.en: [woman's voice echoing] That sword does not belong to her.
translation.ja: 渡(わた)してはいけない

translation.en: Start the engine, kid. This is a bust.
translation.ja: 失敗だ　エンジンをかけろ

translation.en: We're on our way to you.
The sword is right there.
translation.ja: 剣(けん)はそこにあるのに

translation.en: Our key to universal unstoppable power is right there!
translation.ja: 絶大な力を手にする 鍵(かぎ)が目の前に

translation.en: We don't gotta find the sword again, just the girl.
translation.ja: 一度 見つければ こっちの物さ

translation.en: Let's move.
[woman's voice echoing] Bring the sword to the champion.
translation.ja: その剣(けん)を“戦士”に 届けるのだ

translation.en: What champion?
I have the Power!
[singer] ♪ The Power is ours ♪ ♪ It's in our so-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-oul ♪
translation.ja: 魂(たましい)に宿るパワー

translation.en: ♪ The Power is ours ♪ ♪ It's in our so-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-oul ♪
translation.ja: 魂(たましい)に宿るパワー

translation.en: ♪ The Power is ours ♪
♪ Hey, we'll find our purpose ♪
translation.ja: 立ち上がれ 見出せゴール

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause we know we're worth it ♪
♪ And we'll be remembered ♪
♪ We are the defenders, defenders ♪
-♪ Oh ♪ -♪ We fight for the win ♪
♪ We fight till the end ♪
-♪ We fight for the win ♪ -♪ The Power is ours ♪
translation.ja: 戦い抜(ぬ)け 勝利をつかめ 　　　魂(たましい)に宿るパワー

translation.en: ♪ It's in our soul ♪
translation.ja: 勝利をつかめ 　　　魂(たましい)に宿るパワー

translation.en: Hang in there, Kitty. I've got you.
Just crawl onto my shoulders and we can both go home.
translation.ja: 僕の肩(かた)に よじのぼるんだ

translation.en: No.
What do you mean, no?
I don't want us to fall.
We won't fall.
We won't fall...
...if you get on my shoulders right now.
translation.ja: 今すぐ僕の肩(かた)に乗ればね

translation.en: Did you, like, eat rocks today?
I thought they were potatoes.
[man] Did they taste like potatoes?
[Kitty] I've never had a potato before.
-[grunts] -How am I supposed to know?
You jump the rest of the way.
What about you?
I'll be fine.
Dragonfly.
-No. -Dragonfly.
No, don't do it. Focus.
Dragonfly!
[woman] Adam, are you two done yet?
Or do you wanna hang out some more?
translation.ja: もう少しブラブラする？

translation.en: How long have you been there?
Long enough to work on that joke. Thought it might defuse the tension.
translation.ja: ジョークで緊張(きんちょう)を 和らげようと思って

translation.en: Way to take my mind off of imminent death, Krass.
translation.ja: 死の恐怖(きょうふ)を忘れられるね

translation.en: Thanks.
What are best friends for?
You weren't on tracker duty today. What are you doing out here?
Cringer's missing, and this part of the woods
translation.ja: クリンジャーがいないの

translation.en: has the best snacks for grabbing,
translation.ja: この辺は食べ物が多いから

translation.en: so I figured why not start looking for him here?
translation.ja: この辺は食べ物が多いから 近くにいるかと思って

translation.en: Wait, did you just say Cringer was missing?
translation.ja: クリンジャーがいない？

translation.en: Kitty, did you come out here looking for your uncle?
translation.ja: キティも おじさんを捜(さが)しに？

translation.en: Maybe.
He said he wanted to go hunting again.
translation.ja: 狩(か)りしたいと言ってた

translation.en: Puh! He can't hunt without claws.
Try telling him that.
[poacher bot 1] Contain. Shut.
-[snarls] -Push.
translation.ja: 衝撃(しょうげき)　プッシュ

translation.en: Release me, or incur the wrath of my tribe,
translation.ja: 放せ でないと 俺の部族が ただじゃおかない

translation.en: you Beastopoid brutes.
translation.ja: でないと 俺の部族が ただじゃおかない

translation.en: [poacher bot 1] Quarry talks like it is people.
translation.ja: 人間のような物言いだ

translation.en: [poacher bot 2] Quarry talks like we are people.
Don't you poachers want more from life than caging and hurting animals?
translation.ja: 動物を狩(か)るだけの 人生でいいのか？

translation.en: Why not rise up against your keeper? Try living for yourselves.
translation.ja: 主人の言いなりか？ 自由になっては？

translation.en: [poacher bot 1] Initiate capture.
An uprising would displease our keeper.
translation.ja: ご主人様が気を悪くする

translation.en: Query for quarry: what happened to you
translation.ja: 動物に問う ご主人様を不快にさせて どうなった？

translation.en: when last you displeased our keeper?
translation.ja: ご主人様を不快にさせて どうなった？

translation.en: Fair point, my subservient captors.
translation.ja: ごもっとも 従順なわけだ

translation.en: [poacher bot 2] R'qazz will be most pleased to have you back in the fight pit.
translation.ja: お前が帰ってきて ラカズ様も喜ぶ

translation.en: [poacher bot 1] He may add your skull to his trophy belt after your loss.
translation.ja: お前の頭骨を ベルトに飾(かざ)るかもな

translation.en: Oh, what an honor.
Let me at those circuit brains.
No time for the bots.
We gotta spring Cringer.
translation.ja: まずはクリンジャーを

translation.en: I knew you'd come for me.
We needed a faster ride home anyway.
Stand back.
Hang on!
[poacher bot 1] Initiate stowaway protocol.
translation.ja: 密航者 排除(はいじょ)開始

translation.en: Great plan! Now what?
You up for a game of ram-ball?
I'm wearing my helmet, ain't I?
translation.ja: ヘルメット オーケー

translation.en: Adam of the Tiger Tribe risks it all...
translation.ja: さあ タイガー族のアダムが

translation.en: ...to send Krass to the net.
Will she make the...
[sighs] Have I mentioned how much I hate this game?
translation.ja: このゲーム好きじゃないんだ

translation.en: Ow! Whoa!
[grunts] Ow.
Happy to see you too.
But hug me any tighter, and I'll let them keep you next time.
translation.ja: でも 僕をしめ殺さないで

translation.en: Wait. What happened to Krass?
Tiger Tribe for the win!
Cringer, next time you feel like
translation.ja: クリンジャー！ 今度 行くときは ちゃんと教えてね

translation.en: taking on some Beastopoids, let us know, huh?
translation.ja: 今度 行くときは ちゃんと教えてね

translation.en: Now, where would the fun in that be?
Tiger Tribe forever?
[both] Tiger Tribe forever.
Why would you go hunting alone again?
translation.ja: どうして一人で狩(か)りに？

translation.en: Everyone in the tribe does their part.
Even without my claws, I'd like to still do mine.
translation.ja: 爪(つめ)はなくても 自分でやりたいんだ

translation.en: Spoken like a true "Stripe."
translation.ja: 真のタイガーって感じ

translation.en: I don't need a special tattoo to be a part of the tribe.
translation.ja: タトゥーがなくても 部族の一員だ

translation.en: You keep saying that, but I never see you leave.
translation.ja: ずっとそればかり言ってる

translation.en: Now, now, Krass'tine.
Every lost soul the tribe adopts gets their stripes when they so choose.
translation.ja: 誰(だれ)もが自ら決めた時に タトゥーを入れる

translation.en: If Adam isn't ready to set aside his cuff and get his stripe,
translation.ja: アダムにまだ その決心がないなら

translation.en: Adam isn't ready.
This is all I have from my life before.
translation.ja: 僕にはこの腕輪(うでわ)しかない

translation.en: What if whoever lost me doesn't recognize me without this?
translation.ja: 僕の身元を知る 唯一(ゆいいつ)の手がかりだ

translation.en: It's been ten years.
Ah, they probably stopped looking for you by now.
translation.ja: もう捜(さが)してないかも

translation.en: Whatever, helmet head.
Kitty, what you doing?
There's a lady in the tree.
[Adam] Um, can we help you, tree lady?
Uh, your village is full of cats.
translation.ja: この村はネコだらけね

translation.en: I'm apparently afraid of cats.
translation.ja: 私 ネコが苦手みたいで

translation.en: Then why did you come out here to where the Tiger Tribe lives?
translation.ja: じゃあどうして タイガー族の村なんかに？

translation.en: [Teela] A voice in my head told me to.
Ask it how much it knows about cats being able to climb trees.
translation.ja: 木の上に逃(に)げてもムダだよ

translation.en: Why?
I got her!
Adam.
Teela.
Magic!
-What if she got caught? -[Kronis] We'd know.
I've been listening to the Royal security channels.
translation.ja: もしそうなら情報が入る

translation.en: Right, because of all the crime we're doing.
translation.ja: 僕たちの犯罪のせいだね

translation.en: This is about revenge on the king,
translation.ja: これは王への復讐(ふくしゅう)よ

translation.en: We're not not doing crime, though.
translation.ja: でも犯罪じゃない わけじゃない

translation.en: You find her yet?
We're here. Descend.
[Duncan] Is that an actual poacher ship?
translation.ja: あれは密猟船(みつりょうせん)？

translation.en: The sword doesn't want her found.
translation.ja: 剣(けん)がじゃましてる

translation.en: Think I can get these poacher bots up and running to hunt her scent.
translation.ja: 密猟(みつりょう)ボットに追跡(ついせき)させよう

translation.en: Do it. Find the traitorous whelp.
translation.ja: やれ！　裏切り者を捜(さが)せ

translation.en: Apprentice, get to work.
[Teela] Why aren't you afraid of magic like the rest of your people?
translation.ja: あなたは 魔法(まほう)を恐(おそ)れないの？

translation.en: To be clear, the cats don't like magic.
translation.ja: ネコは魔法(まほう)が嫌(きら)いなんだ

translation.en: Why let yourself get captured?
translation.ja: なぜ抵抗(ていこう)しなかった？

translation.en: [sighs] You wouldn't understand.
Oh, because I'm from the jungle and you're from the city?
translation.ja: 僕が森の生まれだから？

translation.en: Believe me, you're from the city.
translation.ja: あなたは街の生まれよ

translation.en: I am?
Yeah, your accent sounds like you were born into an upper family.
translation.ja: 言葉づかいで 上流階級だとわかる

translation.en: Just count your lucky stars you're out here and not back in the house that Randor built.
translation.ja: でもランドア王の街より ここの方がいい

translation.en: You don't like the king?
No one likes the king,
especially at street level...
or below street level, which is where I usually am.
translation.ja: さらには その下の層にいればね

translation.en: Randor won't do anything about all the poaching out here,
translation.ja: 王は密猟(みつりょう)を放置してる

translation.en: so he's no friend of the tribe's either.
And now that we're done bonding,
translation.ja: 絆(きずな)も深まったし

translation.en: shouldn't you be getting back to doing whatever the voice in your head told you to?
translation.ja: “声”に言われた仕事に 戻(もど)ったらどうかな

translation.en: Like I said... you wouldn't understand.
translation.ja: あなたに話しても ムダだと思う

translation.en: Try me.
That isn't jealousy I smell... [sniffs] ...is it?
translation.ja: 嫉妬(しっと)じゃなさそうだな

translation.en: Oh, of course not.
Adam's like a brother to me.
I'm just worried he's gonna leave.
Some flashy magic wielder showing up isn't gonna help anything.
translation.ja: いなくなっちゃうんじゃ ないかってね

translation.en: And it's a problem we can't solve by ramming it with your helmet, I assume.
translation.ja: ヘルメットを打ちつけても 解決できない問題だ

translation.en: Every problem can be solved by ramming it with my helmet.
translation.ja: 私のヘルムは 何でも解決できる

translation.en: We may have a different problem for you to ram.
translation.ja: 別の問題がありそうだ

translation.en: [Teela] So the voice in my head led me here to deliver a package.
translation.ja: だから “声”に導かれて 荷物を届けに来たの

translation.en: To who?
You don't happen to have any champions out here, do you?
translation.ja: ここに“戦士”がいたり しないかしら

translation.en: Being a champion
is about defending those who can't defend themselves.
translation.ja: 自分を守れない人を 守る者

translation.en: That was weird. Where did that come from?
translation.ja: 何を急に？　誰(だれ)の言葉？

translation.en: [man] Are those poacher bots?
translation.ja: 密猟(みつりょう)ボット？

translation.en: Give us the Witch.
translation.ja: 魔女(まじょ)を捜(さが)せ

translation.en: Halt. Do not move.
Tiger Tribe answers to no one!
translation.ja: タイガー族は従わない！

translation.en: Technology!
I need to protect the village.
We'll find the girl and the sword once everyone's dead.
translation.ja: 全員 始末してから 剣(けん)を捜(さが)す

translation.en: Duncan, have the robots burn the village.
translation.ja: ダンカン 村を燃やすの

translation.en: No, no, no, I--
I can't do that.
Coward.
I'll run out first.
Then you get this as far from here as quickly as you can. Hide it.
translation.ja: これをなるべく 遠くへ運んで隠(かく)して

translation.en: If I survive, my voice and I will come back for it.
translation.ja: 生きてれば “声”が教えてくれる

translation.en: [man] We need water! Please--
[woman] Fire! We need to save the village!
translation.ja: 火事よ 村を守らなきゃ

translation.en: Capture.
Ah, thank you, kind stranger.
translation.ja: 感謝する　見知らぬ人

translation.en: [shrieks] Talking tiger!
Whoa! Flying child!
Krass, stand down. He saved me.
translation.ja: クラス 彼は味方だ

translation.en: Hey, Evelyn.
There she is.
They don't get to attack us and run without a fight.
translation.ja: 簡単にやられて たまるもんですか

translation.en: Come on, Cringer.
[poacher bot] Intercept. Capture.
translation.ja: 阻止(そし) 捕獲(ほかく)

translation.en: Contain.
Do not run.
Stop.
Error.
[grunts] Whoa!
Hang on. I've got you. [grunts]
Don't worry. This is my favorite cliff.
translation.ja: 僕のお気に入りの崖(がけ)だ

translation.en: I almost die here all the time.
I told you to get away from here.
translation.ja: 遠くに行けと言ったのに

translation.en: [Krass grunts] Get the real sword out of here.
translation.ja: その剣(けん)を取り出して

translation.en: I had a sword this whole time?
translation.ja: これって剣(けん)だったの？

translation.en: Hand it over, thief.
translation.ja: 返しなさい　泥棒(どろぼう)

translation.en: You want this?
Come and get it.
"By the Power of Grayskull,
translation.ja: “グレイスカルの 力によって”

translation.en: I have the Power"?
I have the Power!
-What? -No!
What? He's... a man.
translation.ja: 何なの？ 大人になった？

translation.en: The Power of Grayskull.
Will never be yours!
The Power of Grayskull...
...belongs to me!
